name: Operation: Extermination
description:
Description

Get deployed in a forest solo or with a partner and exterminate metal aliens with your custom loadout before you run out of time and the poisonous air kills you from intoxication.

Your objective is to get the highest score possible solo or with a partner before the time limit is up by getting kills.

Key features:

  1. Custom loadout
  2. Game timer
  3. Co-op
  4. Metal Aliens
  5. Large gameplay environment

Game Controls
